Class Z4DrawingPoint

    The point where to perform a drawing
    Author:
    gianpiero.diblasi

    • Constructor Detail

      • Z4DrawingPoint

        public Z4DrawingPoint​(Z4Vector z4Vector,
                      double intensity,
                      double temporalPosition,
                      Z4DrawingPointIntent intent,
                      Z4Sign side,
                      boolean useVectorModuleAsSize)
        Creates the object
        Parameters:
        z4Vector - The vector providing position and direction of the drawing
        intensity - The intensity of the drawing (in the range [0,1])
        temporalPosition - The temporal position to use in the color object (in the range [0,1]), -1 if this point has no temporal position
        intent - the intent of this point
        side - The side
        useVectorModuleAsSize - true if the vector module of this point has to be used has size, false otherwise
